plays.text: Penalty to Brent Seabrook 2 minutes for Tripping Marian Hossa
Goal scored by Johan Franzen (Power Play) assisted by Henrik Zetterberg and Jiri Hudler
Penalty to Nikolai Khabibulin 2 minutes for Slashing Johan Franzen served by Patrick Kane
Penalty to Mikael Samuelsson 2 minutes for Tripping Andrew Ladd
Goal scored by Kris Versteeg (Power Play) assisted by Troy Brouwer and Martin Havlat
Goal scored by Aaron Johnson
Penalty to Aaron Johnson 2 minutes for Holding Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Marian Hossa (Power Play) assisted by Niklas Kronwall and Mikael Samuelsson
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Jiri Hudler
Goal scored by Martin Havlat assisted by Troy Brouwer and Brian Campbell
Goal scored by Ben Eager assisted by Brent Sopel and Colin Fraser
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Hooking Dustin Byfuglien
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Interference Troy Brouwer
Goal scored by Niklas Kronwall assisted by Valtteri Filppula and Jiri Hudler
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Marian Hossa and Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Niklas Kronwall 2 minutes for Tripping Colin Fraser
Goal scored by Jiri Hudler assisted by Mikael Samuelsson and Niklas Kronwall
Penalty to Niklas Kronwall 2 minutes for Tripping Dave Bolland
Penalty to Daniel Cleary 2 minutes for Hooking Patrick Kane
Goal scored by Patrick Kane (Power Play) assisted by Jonathan Toews and Patrick Sharp
Penalty to Brian Rafalski 2 minutes for Tripping Patrick Kane
Patrick Kane shootout attempt against Ty Conklin with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Pavel Datsyuk shootout attempt against Nikolai Khabibulin with a Backhand results in a GOAL.
Jonathan Toews shootout attempt against Ty Conklin with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
Henrik Zetterberg shootout attempt against Nikolai Khabibulin with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Patrick Sharp shootout attempt against Ty Conklin with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Jiri Hudler shootout attempt against Nikolai Khabibulin with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Martin Havlat shootout attempt against Ty Conklin with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Marian Hossa shootout attempt against Nikolai Khabibulin with a Slapshot results in a GOAL.
